Sentencas: Integration of biomass gasification with Solid Oxide Fuel Cell (SOFC) is a promising technology, particularly for small scale decentralized power systems.
Titulo: A conceptual process design towards CO2 emission reduction by integration of solar-based hydrogen production and injection into biomass-derived solid oxide fuel cell

Sentencas: In this paper, to reduce the CO2 emission and biomass consumption of this system, it is incorporated with solar-based hydrogen production.
Titulo: A conceptual process design towards CO2 emission reduction by integration of solar-based hydrogen production and injection into biomass-derived solid oxide fuel cell

Sentencas: The produced hydrogen is injected into the biomass gasification-SOFC system, proposing two different configurations.
Titulo: A conceptual process design towards CO2 emission reduction by integration of solar-based hydrogen production and injection into biomass-derived solid oxide fuel cell

Sentencas: In the first configuration, the hydrogen is injected into the anode inlet (to provide a hydrogen rich fuel), while in the second proposed configuration it is injected into the afterburner of the SOFC (to increase the gas turbine inlet temperature).
Titulo: A conceptual process design towards CO2 emission reduction by integration of solar-based hydrogen production and injection into biomass-derived solid oxide fuel cell

Sentencas: The two proposed configurations are comprehensively assessed and compared from thermodynamic, environmental and economic standpoints.
Titulo: A conceptual process design towards CO2 emission reduction by integration of solar-based hydrogen production and injection into biomass-derived solid oxide fuel cell

Sentencas: In thermoeconomic analysis, the negative environmental damage costs of CO2 emission, as the primary greenhouse gas, is taken into account.
Titulo: A conceptual process design towards CO2 emission reduction by integration of solar-based hydrogen production and injection into biomass-derived solid oxide fuel cell

Sentencas: Also, a parametric study is conducted to ascertain the major design variables after which tri-objective optimization is performed based on CO2 emission, levelized cost of electricity and exergy efficiency.
Titulo: A conceptual process design towards CO2 emission reduction by integration of solar-based hydrogen production and injection into biomass-derived solid oxide fuel cell

Sentencas: The results indicated superior performance for the system with hydrogen injection into the anode compared to the injection into the afterburner.
Titulo: A conceptual process design towards CO2 emission reduction by integration of solar-based hydrogen production and injection into biomass-derived solid oxide fuel cell

Sentencas: The former configuration has 20.6% higher exergy efficiency with 23.2% lower emission and 14.0% lower levelized electricity cost.
Titulo: A conceptual process design towards CO2 emission reduction by integration of solar-based hydrogen production and injection into biomass-derived solid oxide fuel cell

Sentencas: For this configuration under the optimum operation, the exergy efficiency, CO2 emission and electricity cost are found to be 24.85%, 0.257 kg/kWh and 0.0911 $/kWh, respectively.
Titulo: A conceptual process design towards CO2 emission reduction by integration of solar-based hydrogen production and injection into biomass-derived solid oxide fuel cell
